response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item carries a significant value to us, and we believe it could bring immense benefits to you. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $995,000. We understand that its true value may be subjective, but we trust that you will appreciate its quality and potential impact. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 995000}
